title: CryBuBo
author: CryBuBo
created_time: April 16, 2023, 04:56:24 PMLast edit: April 17, 2023, 08:30:41 AM by CryBuBo
content: crybubo.comCRYBUBO is the next generation of online classifieds where everyone could buy, sell, offer goods and services for cryptocurrency. We would like to bring cryptocurrency to mass and show to people that tokens could be used in real life. CRYBUBO is just a beginning of our ambition project.What we are planning to do in close future:1.To create Crypto Bulletin Board with possibility to post ads from all around the world.2.To collect more information about ads location to split our platform by countries3.To integrate MetaMask wallet to CRYBUBO platform4.To create a smart contract for safe transaction between buyer and seller inside CRYBUBO.5.To issue our CBB token, which will be used on our platform for all transactionsWhat we are looking for:1.Community which will be fully involved in life of our project and will be the main driver & power of CRYBUBO.2.Talented and ambitious people for our CRYBUBO team3.Advisors4.InvestorsPlease don’t hesitate to CONTACT US INFO@CRYBUBO.COM in case you have any questions, suggestions or propositions. https://t.me/crybubo - public chat

comments.author: CryBuBo
comments.body: Guys, we have an issue to post an ads. We are working on it!

comments.author: CryBuBo
comments.body: Guys, bugs for posting Ads on Google Chrome, Firefox and mobiles has been fixed. We are still working to fix an issue for other browsers (Opera, Edge)  Thanks for your patience!

comments.author: CryBuBo
comments.body: Guys, Issue for posting ads in Opera and Edge browser was fixed ! Enjoy posting your ads on crybubo.com BTC

comments.author: CryBuBo
comments.body: Guys, we are looking for escrow service partners for our platform! Please feel free to contact me in direct, if you wish to work with us in future! BTC
